meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a wen.
meanings.sent1: The growth on the tree had a wennish appearance.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a soft, wennish texture.
meanings.sent3: The wennish spot on the wall looked like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: The wennish clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The wennish smell of the flowers filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a wen.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a dense and wennish consistency.
meanings.sent2: His wennish behavior made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The wennish cat lazily stretched in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her wennish voice echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The wennish taste of the soup reminded her of home-cooked meals.
